original_text: And Joshua turned back at that time and captured Hazor and struck its king with the sword, for Hazor formerly was the head of all those kingdoms.
korean_text: 하솔은 본래 그 모든 나라의 머리였더니 그 때에 여호수아가 돌아와서 하솔을 취하고 그 왕을 칼날로 쳐죽이고

sentences.original_text: And Joshua turned back at that time
and struck its king with the sword
for Hazor formerly was the head of all those kingdoms
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 하솔이 본래 그 모든 왕국의 수도였기 때문이다
